title: The Walt Disney Company - Wikipedia
snippet: The Walt Disney Company, commonly referred to as simply Disney, is an American multinational mass media and entertainment conglomerate headquartered at the Walt Disney Studios complex in Burbank, California, while Disney’s New York operations, including ABC, are headquartered at 7 Hudson Square.

title: Inside The Walt Disney Company’s New NYC Headquarters - The Walt Disney Company
snippet: The Walt Disney Company has had a long history with New York City, and now Disney’s connection to the Big Apple is getting even deeper, with the opening of a new headquarters for its New York businesses at 7 Hudson Square.

title: The Walt Disney Company Offices: Locations & Headquarters | Built In
snippet: The Walt Disney Company is headquartered in Burbank, California, USA and has 15 office locations.

title: Walt Disney Studios (Burbank) - Wikipedia
snippet: The Walt Disney Studios, located in Burbank, California, United States, serves as the corporate headquarters for the Walt Disney Company. The 51-acre (20.6 ha) studio lot also contains several sound stages, a backlot, and other filmmaking production ...

title: Where is Disney's Headquarters? Main Office Location and Global Offices | Clay
snippet: This article will explore the real-world nerve centers of the company: its main headquarters and various office locations that support its worldwide operations. The Walt Disney Company's main headquarters is located at 500 South Buena Vista Street in Burbank, California.
